TI: [Effect of glutamate on the kinetics of sodium metabolism in slices of rat neocortex and hippocampus].
AB: Three kinetic compartments (one extra--and two intracellular) of Na were distinguished in the rat neocortical and hippocampal cuts. Glutamate (Glu) caused the increase of intracellular Na compartments via two mechanisms: by the elevation of Na influx rate constant and by the decrease of Na efflux rate constant. The relationship between the phenomena observed and possible transmitter action of the Glu is discussed.
TT: Vliianie glutamata na kinetiku obmena natriia v srezakh novoi kory i gippokampa krys.
TA: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova
JT: Fiziologicheskii zhurnal SSSR imeni I. M. Sechenova
SO: Fiziol Zh SSSR Im I M Sechenova. 1980 Aug;66(8):1159-64.
